message: The deadline has been extended until August 20th, 11:59pm PT. Please fill out an application for EACH and EVERY single project you want to exhibit. Then feel free to fill out an application for "Alpha One Labs", that will act as the umbrella project. We'll locate all the A1 projects in the A1 tent/area. Please fill out the applications ASAP - resources will become limited. We're printing a Program Guide and need ALL projects submitted by August 20th. See you all there!!
